name: dockge
description: Dockge is a sleek, self-hosted Docker compose manager that provides an intuitive UI for viewing, editing, and managing your Compose stacks. It supports real-time logs, service actions, and deployment functionality.
features: Compose Management: Visual interface for Docker Compose stacks. Simplified orchestration.
Real-Time Logs: Stream logs from all services live. Instant debugging.
Stack Editing: Modify compose files through web UI. No SSH required.
Service Control: Start, stop, and restart services individually. Granular management.
Deployment Tools: Deploy new stacks with ease. Streamlined operations.
Self-Hosted: Beautiful compose manager on your infrastructure. Complete stack control.
